pluginId.description: Unique identifier for the plugin being activated.

version.description: Version of the plugin that has been activated.

activationTimestamp.description: Timestamp of when the plugin was activated.

rating.description: Rating given by the user for the plugin activation (1 to 5).

comments.description: Comments or feedback provided by the user regarding the plugin.

sendThankYouEmail.description: Indicates if a thank-you email should be sent to the user after activation.

logFeedback.description: Indicates if the feedback should be logged for future analysis.

notifyAdmin.description: Indicates if the admin should be notified about the activation review.
